page.title: 05ENVIROMENT
page.content: Houghton Regis and part of Dunstable are on hills and the area surrounding them are also hilly.The highest of which is 130 metres.Although it is a built up area there is still a lot of open land around.It is situated near rural and urban areas and has easy connections with the M1 and A5.There are small woodland areas around the town.Industry plays a big part in employment.There are three motor part or motor making industries in this area.The A5 was an important Roman Road which was called Watling Street The Five Knolls are of historic importance as not long ago people uncovered them to find that they are mass graves of people who died of a plague.
